data: The `$env/static/public` module provides access to public environment variables that are statically injected at build time. These variables are safe to expose in client-side code since they're intended to be public. They must be prefixed with `PUBLIC_` in your `.env` file to be included in this module. Use this for configuration values that need to be accessible from the browser, such as API endpoints or feature flags.
Module for accessing public environment variables (prefixed with `PUBLIC_`) that are statically injected at build time and safe to expose in client-side code.
Access public environment variables in SvelteKit applications via the $env/static/public module.
